◆ padding_coefficients_

const Eigen::Vector3f mesh_filter::StereoCameraModel::Parameters::padding_coefficients_
private

padding coefficients

Note
absolute padding in meters = coeff[0] * z^2 + coeff[1] * z + coeff[2]
